Ramhorn/Stinkbomb/Nemesis Enforcer:

::Ramhorn and Stinkbomb nod after hearing Liono's orders, jumping up, 
unloading fire power into Nemesis Enforcer, and then retreating towards the 
Maxi base as Enforcer collapses to the ground::

::Nemesis Enforcer gets up, coughing and slamming his foot into the ground:: 
"Slag! Oh, well...I have other plans..."
::Nemesis transforms to his beast mode, flying off towards a certain base...::
